author: erlehmann
long_description:
This mod changes many full nodes, slabs, and stairs to have studs on top to look like interlocking bricks.
I have tested it with Minetest Game and Mineclonia, so it should work with MineClone2 or MineClone5.

Many naturally generated nodes do not have studs, to avoid a Minetest rendering performance problem.
You can read more about that here: https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=28068&p=409857
name: studs
short_description: Adds studs on top of many nodes that are not ground content. This makes the decorated nodes look like interlocking bricks, similar to LEGO.
title: Studs
